CreateCluster.title: Creating an EMR cluster instance

CreateInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: emr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateInstance
<Common request parameters>

{
    "ResourceSpec": {
        "MasterResourceSpec": {
            "StorageType": "5",
            "DiskType": "CLOUD_PREMIUM",
            "Cpu": "4",
            "DiskSize": "100",
            "MemSize": "8192",
            "RootSize": "100",
            "Spec": "CVM.S2"
        },
        "CoreCount": "2",
        "CoreResourceSpec": {
            "StorageType": "5",
            "DiskType": "CLOUD_PREMIUM",
            "Cpu": "4",
            "DiskSize": "100",
            "MemSize": "8192",
            "RootSize": "100",
            "Spec": "CVM.S2"
        },
        "MasterCount": "1"
    },
    "Placement": {
        "ProjectId": "0",
        "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-3"
    },
    &SupportHA=0
    "TimeSpan": "3600",
    "VPCSettings": {
        "SubnetId": "subnet-xxxxxxx",
        "VpcId": "vpc-xxxxxx"
    },
    "LoginSettings": {
        "Password": "tencent@cloud123"
    },
    "PayMode": "0",
    "AutoRenew": "0",
    "TimeUnit": "s",
    "Software": [
        "zookeeper-3.4.9",
        "hadoop-2.8.4",
        "knox-1.2.0"
    ],
    "InstanceName": "emr test",
    "ProductId": "4"
}
CreateInstance.title: Creating an instance
